grammar.title: Present Tense
grammar.notes: छु for I, छौ for you, छ for he/she

grammar.title: Negation
grammar.notes: दिनँ for I, दैन for he/she

practice.question: What does 'शुभ प्रभात' mean?
practice.explanation: शुभ प्रभात (shubha prabhat) means Good morning

practice.question: What does 'शुभ रात्रि' mean?
practice.explanation: शुभ रात्रि (shubha ratri) means Good night

practice.question: What does 'कस्तो छ?' mean?
practice.explanation: कस्तो छ? (kasto chha?) means How are you?

practice.question: What does 'ठीक छ' mean?
practice.explanation: ठीक छ (thik chha) means I'm fine

practice.question: What does 'फेरि भेटौंला' mean?
practice.explanation: फेरि भेटौंला (pheri bhetaula) means See you again
